description: Try our easy to follow Halloween Devilled Eggs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Devilled eggs,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Healthier Halloween,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Halloween,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Halloween Devilled Eggs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: whole egg mayonnaise with olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Peel eggs and cut into halves. Remove yolks, placing the yolks from 2 of the eggs into a bowl (see tip). Mash with avocado, lemon juice and chilli flakes (optional). Spoon mixture into empty egg whites.
To make olive spiders, halve olives lengthways. Use one half for the spider bodies. Slice the other half to make 8 legs and arrange around the body on top of the yolk mixture.
Arrange egg halves on a platter with fresh carrots and cucumbers cut in thin strips to serve.
